mapper.select: SELECT subNo, email, s.memberNo, nickName, TO_CHAR(subStart,'YYYY-MM-DD') subStart, TO_CHAR(subEnd,'YYYY-MM-DD') subEnd FROM subscript s JOIN member m ON m.memberNo = s.memberNo WHERE SYSDATE >= subStart AND SYSDATE <= subEnd
SELECT LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME='SUBMAIL_SEQ'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUBMAILINFO(mailNo, title, content, sendDate, senderEmail) VALUES(#{mailNo}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{senderEmail})
